headline: Does Campbell’s (CPB) Snack Plant Closure Quietly Redefine Its Brand and Supply Chain Strategy?
summary: Campbell’s Company recently announced it will close its Hyannis, Massachusetts snacks plant, consolidating Cape Cod and Kettle Brand crisp production to other US sites and affecting 49 workers. Beyond the consolidation, Campbell’s plans to preserve the Cape Cod Chips brand’s local heritage through continued regional investment, partnerships, and community impact grants. We’ll now examine how the supply chain consolidation, particularly the Hyannis plant closure, may influence Campbell’s...
